SEARCH
Package battle.and.save

Class RecordBattle

java.lang.Object
battle.and.save.RecordBattle
public class RecordBattle extends Object
The RecordBattle class contains methods for managing and recording battles between droids. It includes functionality for setting droid health to zero, determining the winner, giving damage, and recording battles. The class also provides methods for saving and loading battle records to and from a file.
